Sentencas: Because of their electrical, magnetic and catalytic properties rare earth and transition metal mixed oxides are important compounds.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion

Sentencas: Lanthanum chromites have been extensively used as solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) interconnect materials.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion

Sentencas: In this work, lanthanum chromites partially substituted by alkaline earth metals were synthesized by the urea combustion process.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion

Sentencas: TG and DSC techniques were used to evaluate the presence of the organic material in the powder after reaction on the hot plate.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion

Sentencas: The powders were calcinated at 900 degrees C and characterized by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion

Sentencas: The results show that the particles have nanometric dimensions and the perovskite structure was formed.
Titulo: Lanthanum chromites partially substituted by calcium, strontium and barium synthesized by urea combustion
